experiences.title: Toledo Private Heritage Journey
experiences.description: A chauffeured day beyond Madrid, curated with a private guide and unhurried pace. Toledo, the 'City of Three Cultures,' is a UNESCO World Heritage site where Christian, Jewish, and Muslim heritage converge. This is a full-day immersion: luxury transport, expert guide, curated stops, and a traditional lunch. Return to Madrid in the evening, enriched by Spain's layered history.

detailedItinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
detailedItinerary.description: Your chauffeur and guide collect you in a luxury vehicle. Scenic 1-hour drive to Toledo with historical commentary en route.

detailedItinerary.title: Toledo Cathedral
detailedItinerary.description: Begin with Spain's most important Gothic cathedral. Admire the architecture, art, and sacristy treasures.

detailedItinerary.title: Jewish Quarter & Synagogues
detailedItinerary.description: Walk through the ancient Jewish quarter. Visit Santa María la Blanca and El Tránsito synagogues.

detailedItinerary.title: Traditional Lunch
detailedItinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely lunch at a classic Toledo restaurant. Castilian cuisine, local wine, and relaxed atmosphere.

detailedItinerary.title: Alcázar & Panoramic Views
detailedItinerary.description: Visit the Alcázar fortress. Walk to a viewpoint overlooking the Tagus River and Toledo's skyline.

detailedItinerary.title: El Greco Museum or Free Time
detailedItinerary.description: Option: visit the El Greco Museum or explore Toledo's artisan shops (damascene work, marzipan).

detailedItinerary.title: Return to Madrid
detailedItinerary.description: Depart Toledo. Return to your Madrid hotel by 6:30 PM.

experiences.title: Segovia Royal Escape
experiences.description: A refined excursion beyond Madrid, curated for comfort and cultural depth. Segovia is known for its Roman aqueduct, fairy-tale Alcázar, and Castilian cuisine. This full-day journey includes luxury transport, private guide, curated stops, and a traditional lunch featuring Segovia's signature dish: cochinillo (roast suckling pig). Return to Madrid in the evening, satisfied and inspired.

detailedItinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
detailedItinerary.description: Your chauffeur and guide collect you in a luxury vehicle. Scenic 1.5-hour drive to Segovia with countryside views.

detailedItinerary.title: Roman Aqueduct
detailedItinerary.description: Begin at Segovia's iconic Roman aqueduct. Your guide explains its engineering and historical significance.

detailedItinerary.title: Alcázar of Segovia
detailedItinerary.description: Tour the Alcázar, a stunning medieval castle that inspired Disney's Cinderella Castle. Explore the towers, throne room, and panoramic views.

detailedItinerary.title: Old Town Walk
detailedItinerary.description: Stroll through Segovia's old town. Visit the Plaza Mayor, Cathedral, and charming cobblestone streets.

detailedItinerary.title: Traditional Lunch
detailedItinerary.description: Enjoy lunch at a historic Segovian restaurant. Signature dish: cochinillo (roast suckling pig) or alternatives. Local wine included.

detailedItinerary.title: Free Time or Optional Visit
detailedItinerary.description: Option: visit a local artisan workshop or simply enjoy coffee in the plaza.

detailedItinerary.description: Depart Segovia. Return to your Madrid hotel by 6:00 PM.
